name: A Letter To Everyone
description:
TW: Existential themes.

This is just a very short, one or two minute piece of writing I made in Renpy. I've been feeling very sentimental and sad lately, but I felt the urge to reach out and post something in the hopes it would be interesting or helpful for someone else out there. I hope you enjoy reading it.

Music: https://narfnra.bandcamp.com/track/a-very-quiet-town
